features: Designed to fit young riders 8-12 years (4'2"-5'4"/127-162cm tall)
Stay hydrated without slowing down using the hands-free ReTrakt magnetic hose return system
User-friendly 1.75L Hydrapak reservoir features a slide closure for easy cleaning and a locking bite valve to prevent leaks before and after your ride
Bring extra layers and snacks in 6L of cargo storage
Keep all personal gear secure thanks to youth-friendly design of zippered storage for all contents
Remain comfortable in all temperatures with spacer mesh backpanel
Stay visible in low light conditions with reflective trim and a tail light attachment loop
